Content: What's going on with the courtyard? There's water everywhere.
Someone must've triggered the defense mechanism. This doesn't look good.
No need to rush. Let us find a way to lower the water level and restore the pathway first.
I saw some movement over there, we should go check it out!
The door's open, I'll go in front, you guys keep up.
At last... I hope everything is well inside.
The situation is still unclear, stay sharp.
I sense no traces of lies in the flow... I guess you're telling the truth.
Anyway, we can discuss later, it's not safe to stay here.
Wrong target to chase, little guy.
It chased its way here following the overfrequency tracks. What short temper.
I will give it a lesson.
The power of thunder... and moving golems...
Do you recall the message we received at the supply site? A Midnight Ranger went overfrequent and missing in the Whining Aix's Mire.
Greeting us is a member of the Midnight Rangers who's responsible for overfrequency investigation. Her name is Yin Lin.
Instead of her real name, though, people choose more to call her... the Inquisitor.

Yang Yang, Ranger of the Pioneer Battalion, you have been using your abilities on an outstanding regularity lately. In addition, your participation in this operation was made only after your recovery from a grievous injury. Therefore, It is my decision that you be kept under my close inspection.
Rover, you are no exception despite your fortune-favored escape from a plight.
I came across rumors that you were confident in your attempt to collect the Threnodian's power shattered and distributed across Huanglong.
Those who are so blind as to dare contact that power start with blood-boiling passion, but soon enough they cross the line and sink into madness.
A team of overfrequency risks on a mission... my Interrogation Chamber could not afford two at once.
Are you trying to freak us out?
The last one with the very opinion you just spoke of had lost every sense and been disposed of by me.
Yin Lin, Rover, please do not take each other wrong.
When I was assaulted by that Crownless avatar and injured badly, it was Yin Lin who made sure that my frequency stabilized, only then the treatment for me was concluded safely.
Oh, and I have not got a chance to say thank you.
Overfrequency is an abyss one will not escape once he is trapped. You were almost a victim, lingering around its edge. You should know best how unpleasant the feeling was.
Your survival last time was out of mere luck, which might not favor you a next time. And you should be warned off any delusion about my inquisition, should it occur to you.
Shh, keep quiet, little one. Not the stage where you are needed yet.
Besides, if it's Yang yang... Nothing, my wishes for your completion of the mission.
The Aix took its way in that direction.
The Whining Aix's Mire is not safe... now that we go the same path, why don't we team up?
The Mourning Aix is injured, let's follow!
He's already medically dead, it's a miracle for him to last till now.
Maybe he's still holding onto something...
The sword you found was his wife's relic. I brought back from the Fallen Grave 3 years ago.
She sent herself afloat with the gravity stream before delivering a fatal blow to Aix. Then she was thrown to the sea, leaving no remains. We were only able to find her blade.
And Yunhe, I warned him not to be sunken into the past, but he took none of my words, until losing his sanity.
The fact that he takes the blade with him constantly proves it best.
As a fellow Midnight Ranger, I believe they understand each other.
The last thing he would give up, is maybe just his wife's legacy.
Now, the Mourning Aix is finally down, and peace is returning here... At the last moment, I think he let go with satisfaction and relief.
Yin Lin, what is your arrangements next?
I will curb the chaos provoked by overfrequency that be or will be.
Rover, keep in mind, there is an eye on you, every moment.
Remember this person. You might not be as lucky if you should fall into my hand.
Star Core? Leave the lighthouse now!
The TDs were easily dealt with. The lighthouse began to fade like a wary sleepy eye.
It went out in the end.
Only the sound of waves remained.
Only a sparkle of light lit the night in the wild. Windwatch Lighthouse was still there, carrying on its mission.
At the cost of so many lives, the Feilian Beringal was sealed within at long last.
Please, I wish to take a moment to commemorate their sacrifices...
I'm shocked to see how a Resonator's ability is able to create a forest of such scale.
Can't we just eradicate the Beringal?
Our objective... Isn't here to take its life, is it not?
Bailian mentioned the entrance to the Confinement Woods is located at the upper-level platform.
It's been a long time since anyone been here, the original access roads are blocked, we have to find a way to get up there first.
Aww, don't blame me, you attacked first.
Don't go any further, it's too dangerous!
Plus... I don't think it's going to take attack us any further.
Allow me to introduce, Kakarot, he's from the New Federation, nowadays, he's a member of the Rangers.
Did Commander Jiyan sent you to assist us?
I'm just interested in the big baboon friend locked up in here, but Jiyan's not very fond of me taking it out on my own.
And I guess I'm in luck, you guys happened to be on this mission, and I thought I'd just tag along, temporarily that is.
But, to be frank, I probs won't like you kiddos, and you might not like me either.
I suggest we keep our separate ways before we engage monkey boy, shall we?
Kakarot doesn't belong to any company, so he tends to do things on his own.
I've only ever seen him during battles.
When he's in battle, Star Cores, unique only to that of TDs, appear over his body. I don't know how that came to be...
He probably was the most mysterious person in all of Tianchang before you came.
Why did you stop him from going after them?
Well... The Hoochiefs' behaviors are a bit odd, which reminded me of the Academy's research, which made me have some speculations.
After they find a suitable habitat, they usually do not migrate easily, unless the adult individuals who have lost the fight for the leader and leaves with their own group.
There, the facilities here don't look like they were installed by any personnel, likely by them.
Also judging by these footprints, there can only be one explanation... This is where the Hoochiefs have set their shelter.
That Hoochief wasn't intentionally ambushing us, rather, we stepped into their territory and that made it feel threatened.
It'll make even more sense if these Hoochiefs are part of the same family as well.
I've probably said too much again unknowingly... Is best that we entrust Bailian on this research.
This terminal belongs to a Resonator died in the fight with Feilian Beringal fifteen years ago. His name was Chang'shi.
There should be record of that fight... No, the record in the terminal got the same time tag, but not about the fight.
It says... "After staying a while in the forest, some Hoochief stopped attacking us."
"One of them even started to imitate the posture of Midnight Rangers. I showed it a few tricks, turns out it was a fast learner."
"Did they want to communicate with us? I can't see through their mind."
"Should be nice to be a Hoochief researcher after the battle."
So that explains why it's imitating Ranger gestures, it learned them through him.
It's been 15 years... And this terminal is still in perfect conditions. The Hoochief must've kept it in a well hidden spot, safeguarding it.
It's been waiting for Changshi to come back all this time.
It's a shame he never did.
Yes... Until it saw us, the terminals we're holding, and decided to approach us.
When we first met it, it tried to stop us from approaching the cage at the theater.
Over in the eastern side of the forest, the map the Rangers received was probably stolen by it from the other Hoochiefs.
Why help us... Is it just because it had a connection with humans in the past? I don't understand.
Caution this, caution that. How 'bout you all run home to your mommies.
The two of ya might as well sit back and be ready for clean-up duty, while I take out Mr. Kong over here.
Now, I gotta admit, they do have some smarts.
In order to avoid the expansion of the dispute, we should...
Does darn animals... For something with no brain cells, they sure learned fast how to fight.
Don't tell me they learned my tactics too?
You kids stay here, you're only gonna stand in my way of gettin' warmed up.
Looks like you two attracted quite an audience.
All they're doing is just jumping in, they wouldn't even fight me. How am I supposed to train like this, you kiddos own me, you know.
It's the Beringal... It stopped all of this.
Now, I gotta admit, they do have some smarts.
Perhaps, it's long been tired of living in this cage.
You seem rather proficient in fighting TDs…
Is this some kind of artificial device?
You are truly… A conflicting existence to behold.
You said you've lost your memories, but your reactions during combat shows otherwise.
You're also a Resonator, yet the Resonance Terminal you carry… is unlike anything I've seen before.
During that last fight, it felt like an instinct to me.
As for the Terminal, do you mean this?
Yes. The Terminal is a necessary tool for every Resonator. It helps us absorb and transform the powers of TDs.
Sorry, I can't think of anything else.
No, it's me who owe you an apology. Knowing that you've lost your memory, I shouldn't have kept asking you these questions.
Many mysteries surround you... Since the rising stream has guided me to you, then I shall trust its choice. I believe you bear no ill will.
You were curious about this device?
It's called a "Choral Beacon". The Beacon can detect and record fluctuations within its surroundings. Setting itself as a guide for travelers.
Practice is better than words. Why don't you give it a try?
Splendid, isn't it? I've never viewed Tiancheng from afar. Our city.

"We suffer, from the pain and disorder; they are talons of the tide at night. Yet there blossoms, the most vibrant flower; it is the child of chaos in the final light." It's a line I read in a collection of poems.
Just as I suspected, not only is your Terminal of unusual design, it also lacks basic utilities.
No worries. Let me share the installation data with you.
We've arrived at the rendezvous point. My team should be here any minute.
My bad! It should've been a one-shot from that distance!
Allow me to introduce them to you. Chixia and Bailian.
We are part of the same team conducting a survey mission. The previous anomalous disturbances and earthquake have forced us to be separated.
Nice moves you got back there! I don't think I've seen you before. Where'd you come from? Let's go a few rounds!
Apologies, but I believe now isn't a good time for sparring.
May I know your name? Why are you with Yangyang?
Also, do you have anything to do with the anomalous disturbances?
No, Bailian. You've taken it the wrong way. I was in the Gorges of Spirits and met…
Rover must've fell into the valley because of the earthquake, and... suffers some memory loss.
As for the disturbances... I assume it's caused by the accumulation of Wutherons. The space below the gorge is narrow with sides mostly surrounded by sheer rock.
A high rank Devourer? No, wait…
I won't… Let you hurt anyone!
Is this... where the stream fades?
Oh, you won't be feeling anything very soon!
Hold it! Don't move a muscle!
Direct contact with Wutherium may cause numerous anomalies to Resonators. Not only did you directly absorbed them into your body, but went through the peril unscathed.
What you think of me is none of my concern.
Yangyang receiving treatment is more important.
She's at risk of Overclocking. There's nothing more I can do.
T-Then we gotta send her back…
No time to hesitate. You, and the... Rover, escort Yangyang back to Tiancheng.
I'll take care of the rest of the mission on my own.
Save your gratitude for Yangyang. I'm not foolish enough to believe that you fell into the gorge by sheer accident. The reason I'm doing this… is because I have no other choice.
I will investigate the gorge myself once I'm done with the mission.
The traces at the scene never deceives. Everything will eventually come to light.
You must be the Rover, I presume?
My name is Taoqi, Acting Chief Officer of the Huanglong Ministry of Development. Bailian informed me of the situation.
I thank you for your assistance. Forgive me for the poor hospitality at this time of emergency.
Chixia, why don't you show Rover around the city?
Huh? Why me? I need to stay with Yangyang.
Did you forget what Bailian asked you to do?
It's not safe out there these days, it would be best if you could keep our guest accompany. As for Yangyang… I'll let you know first-hand once I receive word about her.
And for your own safety, please be reluctant to leave city grounds without authorization. Okay?
Ugh! Wait... You can't just leave this to me!
Fine. Follow me. I'll show you around, I guess.
Are you experiencing dizziness, clouding of consciousness, or heavy headache?
What about quasi-tinnitus symptoms? To be specific, do you hear sounds like chaotic noises?
No. Why is this feeling like a diagnosis?
Just checking your current physical status.
Though not so obvious, your muscular strength and pupillary response are lower than average level.
The situation I have been worrying about... has come true? Can I see your hand?
Let me feel your pulse, hmm, abrupt pulse...
As expected, your frequency is turbulent and abrupt. It is possible that you fail to suppress the power and overclock.
I respect your will, and to be honest I might be more impatient than you are. But listen, the result of a resonator's overclocking could be disastrous. You... do know what they are like, don't you?
Indeed, resonators have strong Forte, but if they are exposed to Wutherium inappropriately, or use their power too much, it is likely to court a phenomenon we call "overclock".

You will lose your senses and consciousness in a very short course of time, then you are lost in madness or explode, and finally, you are reduced to only a few pieces of information traces, made up of almost pure energy.
One who devour monsters must stay constantly alert of being devoured by monsters. Don't get into a more thorough loss just because of an urgent cause.
I will take note of that.
Sorry, essentially this is my fault.
Worrying about things like this, I reached out to Murtefi as soon as you set off for a solution. It turns out in a bit of haste at that stage, though.
Commander, are you talking about that thing the Chief Researcher mentioned we contacted...
Yes, the converter that can channel power out from human body.
Anyway, why don't you find Murtefi at the Academy. He should have some methods to relieve your symptoms.
As for your meeting with the Hierarch, don't worry.
I have sent the request to her. I will contact you at once when the response comes.
Did you just say... a fierce Resonator just came to Huanglong lately?
Yes, yes yes! Rumors are that guy took down a huge Tacet Discord just in one blow! And he even easily dealt with a terrible Threnodian on his own!
He must be with those people of Huanglong now! I saw him enter Tiancheng, with my very eyes!
Brother, my good brother. I'm out with all I know... Please, let me go!
These are the only values you are left with!
Done playing? Don't forget our proper business.
The days without commands are so boring, I have to find some fun for myself.
Next, let's go meet that Resonator. Threnodian, Threnodian... Ha!
And you, are you trying to discipline me? Or are you envying me doing whatever I like?
Listen to this. Are you excited? Isn't it making you high?
Our boss has an arrangement. If you happen to be a hindrance to the plan...
I will regard you as a dissonance and wipe you out.
You just suddenly fell to the ground and didn't move... I, I thought...
I must take to the Academy, now! As long as the power of Threnodians are taken out, your frequency will return stable. And physically... you will become immediately better!
Sorry I'm taking you into another trouble.
Calm down. It's not that bad.
What, what are you talking about... How can that be trouble.
No no no, you always say that, every one of you.
I don't know what kind of past you have, maybe... you are long familiar with keeping to yourself and not relying on anyone. But from now on, you won't be fighting alone again.
Commander Jiyan just told us how terrible overclocking could be. You have to have the Threnodian power taken out sooner.
Don't forget that I was part of the operation too, I am your partner! Isn't it all too natural to be solving problems together?
Besides, the one we are about to meet... is that Chief Researcher...
Don't worry, I'll be with you. It will be OK with me present.
Wait, what's... No! It can't be!
Stop following me already! Can't you hear the bells?
Ugh, why am I getting mad at a dummy with no memories... You, you don't understand a thing!
Listen up, I'm only gonna say this once...
That knell, is meant for fallen comrades!
It's great to see you're recovered. I thought you were...
Uh-uh, don't you jinx her. Good thing she received treatment in time, Yangyang's in one piece.
During moments like these I could never place myself at peace. I'm aware that you all feel the same as well.
Rather than the sound of bells itself, I am more fearful of the silence that follows.
Such as those devoured of life, leaving nothing but stillness.
Yet, no matter how formidable the Lament may be, we shall never cease to make our voices heard.
The dawn shall put and end to it all!
Through the enduring night. May you all return victorious.
Or are you... Looking for me?
Who are you? You shouldn't be authorized to be wandering outside city grounds at such times.
This is a high risk area. I highly recommend that you leave as soon as possible, even for someone such as yourself.
Your concern is greatly appreciated, kind little skylark. But I'm afraid I can't leave until I find what I came for.
Forgive me for the mist I just cast out of the blue. Gave you guys quite a spook... I guess?
Saw a group of four heading east just a while ago.
Consider this piece of intel free of charge. A compensation for earlier.
The east… Wait! Are there anything else? Were.. Were they wearing Huanglong uniforms?
Ha, you're right on time. I'm just getting warmed up!
Now, we shall work as a team and clear the area of TDs.
That's weird! No TDs, even the Tacet Field is gone!
Aww, An'ke's late to the party!
Oh, don't worry! An'ke's a good girl, here to help everyone defeat the bad guys!
It's all your fault, Aalto! If it wasn't for you running off in a moment like this, An'ke wouldn't have to go through the trouble looking for you!
You've managed to find your buddies, it looks like. Whaddya say, how's that for accurate intel?
If there's ever anything ya need, your patronage will be most welcomed.
The unknown disperses with irresistible temptations, and on top of that I managed to find what I came for as well.
We simply dropped by to see if someone required any, supportive services.
I was gonna say, Blake folks, huh.
Don't worry, Yangyang. I won't ask anything stupid. I don't have anything to deal with them, anyway.
A lady of integrity... Intriguing, clients of your type never cease to draw charm.
Don't be discouraged, our business terms aren't as demanding as you may think.
Aalto, you're at it again... The Reincarnator told me to keep an eye out on you, you know!
If we keep wasting time, I'm really gonna get angry now!
Oh, how unfortunate... It feels that we're missing out on a business of a lifetime.
Since we're at it, consider this one on the house as well. They bear the same markings, your Terminal and Sui'guang.
Well, that, is something for you to find out—
Or perhaps, expect a business proposal in the near future.
I am not in favor of keeping the contact between my Lady and Rover.
Creating chaos to cover up their cunningly selected targets is their consistent way. Though Scar wreaked havoc at my Lady's residence, his real target was Rover.
All the hidden purposes behind these, the real identity of Rover. Until they are found out, I will not let my Lady take risks again.
I don't doubt people I use, that's my attitude. Hesitating and changing minds before battles only get us in disarray.
Besides, until now Rover has been working well with our plan. His attempts to absorb Threnodian powers around here are also undoubted.
Don't you think that is precisely the suspicious part? Why is Rover appearing just at the moment when we need the Threnodian powers the most?
And why is there only Rover who can absorb the Threnodian powers?
Are we going to expose my Lady to completely unknown risks just because this power, whose source we know neither?
My Lady has so much to care for Huanglong, but there could be blind spots even she cannot find, and that's where... I have to help her...!
You never mentioned this. I didn't know that the question marks around Rover disturbs you so much.
Did the assault at the Hierarch change your mind, or you have always been doubtful about Rover?
Deep inside, is your real worry Rover, or yourself, who almost let the Hierarch be hurt?
You always come by this kind of accident.
I don't know what you mean.
I was originally going to the Academy.
Hm? So coming to Tianchenng and presenting yourself to my Lady were an accident, or part of your plan?
I wanted to find my memory.
Threads from the past led me to the Hierarch.
Spare me... if you're not behind some plots, that was the funniest folly I've ever heard.
No matter what you're after, I hope you will... keep your distance from my Lady.
I have promised her, we will fight against Threnodians together.
Against Threnodians? How can you make that sound so effortless?
You guys at Huanglong would say... against all odds?
Even though we'd be far outmatched, we would still go against the odds...
Is that... what my Lady said to you? How come, she has told you even this...
Even Suiguang would have said that was impossible, only she... only she would smile and persist, and never back down.
Let me ask you this, do you really understand what she meant?
Or, what will you give in return of her trust in you?
Of course, I will honor the promise.
If she chooses to believe in you, I respect her decision, and you will be free from my interference.
But that doesn't mean I will put down the guard... keep in mind, there are eyes on you in Tiancheng, always.
If my Lady were in danger, I would sweep any obstruction for her. Guarantee.
Can't wait to silence me? So ruthless, aren't you? Or you play music only for mourning?
You were twining yourself with the discordance. You have forgotten the boss's business. This is the punishment you deserve.
Business? Why don't we get down to something more interesting? Have you ever seen someone absorb the Threnodian power? With Rover own body!
Just absorb a little more, a little! And the Threnodian will be reassembled inside Rover body.
Lunatic note, you better really understand what the boss wants.
In a while, the climax of this movement will be conducted by me. I shall not tolerate any errors.
Errors? How could I possibly make errors? I will ignite the true light for you.
You will be my audience, right? My sister.
[After the cinematic, camera comes back to the control room. You fell faintly, with Aalto's shouts of astonishment and sighs of frustration in the distance.]
A homologous power with it, and a sensibility of the existence of that civilization...
Rover, your identity is getting even more interesting.
Three days later, you wake up from coma. \nYangyang takes you out of the clinic and sends you back to the living quarter.
It's that one with Blake Bloom we met before. He took you to the Ranger on duty.
He said he accidentally met you in coma outside the laboratory remains.
The lockdown of the remains was already broken, but you... despite the medical staff's statement that your frequency was stable and everything was fine, you look somehow not so right.

Tinnitus strikes in a sudden. You hold your temples with one hand to stay sober. Yangyang looks at you with care and tries to speak but stops. \nThe scenes you have seen during the coma starts to come back. Wutherons turn from escaped status to visible, entitative energy that is leaping upward... \nBefore you can make a reaction, your shoulder is tapped.
Yangyang! Let's... Oh? Rover, you are awake?!
Great, you can walk now. I knew you'd be fine!
Take care, Rover is just awakened. Needs time to recover.
Yes yes yes, but you're talking about average people! Rover is different. Such tiny issue is nothing for Rover.
I'm still waiting for you to fight alongside me again.
Indeed, it might be difficult for Rover to take time and rest.
Abnormalities are getting even serious at the Norfall Barrens. Just now we detected another highly-intensive Wutheron jet.
Maybe because of the Avatar of Crownless, TDs are becoming abnormally active. There is much pressure on Tiancheng's defense.
Humph, they can try as they dare! I will never allow them into the city and hurt the people!
I seem to have seen that...
There's not even a chance for us to resist.
What ending? What are you talking about? Can you wake up?
Have you seen strange illusions during the coma?
Sorry, I didn't mean to listen... but you kept mumbling about don't go, don't leave you behind etc.. It sounded upset.
Did you think we would face the same destiny of failure because of that?
But my take is your worry is unnecessary. It's far too early to talk about failure when we have not fought.
It should have been only a dream during your coma. Everything's gonna be fine...
That's right! Did you forget you have us, and everyone at Tiancheng? That kind of terrible and shocking thing won't happen!
No, it's something from the past. It happened.
Past? Are you saying... you remember something?
Do you want to take some rest for a while? You look disturbed now. Even if the enemy is powerful, it's not yet time to give up...

Yangyang might have said something else, but you can't hear it completely. "Not yet time to give up." The sentence was like a curse in silence. \n Figures overlap, and you recall your fellow warriors had said the same thing, but later, he was pierced by Tds and reduced to pieces right in front you. \n Acute excitement sprawls over your heart. You turn back and run away.
Left behind, the three watch your shadow as you leave and feel overwhelmed. Chixia was depressed and irritated, trying to catch up to you and make things clear. Yangyang stops her and shakes head.
Let's leave Rover to Roverself for the moment.
Re, really? But given Rover status now, aren't you afraid something happen to Rover?
Don't worry, I'll find Rover later. But for now, Rover needs a little time.

You spend a time in Tiancheng paralyzed. Though road was under your feet, and though you keep walking, you find yourself going in circles in an intangible maze no matter where you go. \n You are trapped.
Then, a slight sigh come from behind. It turns to clear calls. \n You know who that is.
Rover... let me walk with you.
Those you saw during the coma weren't dreams... You did recall terrible things, right?
Meaning? But I think there is no meaning in the world in the first place. It's the people that create meanings.
Look, the air flows around from the moment it was born, from one place to another, without a destination. It feels like meaningless.
But later one day, people named it, "wind".
Bailian's interest is studying things in the past, and the stories behind them. Those stories intertwine and are woven to become "history".
Chixia keeps helping people, any kind of people. She defends Tiancheng, and defends the people. There must be a name in her heart...
When people create these names, meanings seem to come with them.
So in my opinion, sometimes it feels like we're playing a treasure hunting game, the treasure hidden in all the corners.
When you find it, it becomes your meaning.
You don't have to tell me what exactly you recall, because I'm sure you can find your own meaning.
Of course, if that makes you feel better, I'm always here to be your audience.
I thought I could help you, but it turns out I'm a... loser.
Sorry, that must have let you down.
Don't say that. I'll never be down for you. We all will never.
Here, let me take you somewhere.
Maybe you have come across here for many times... but for now, just right now, please have a good look at Tiancheng.
This is our home. It's not so glorious, but it has stood rains and storms for forty years. The hope has lasted without breaking.
I don't know if it will get through the crisis that you met back in time...
But before that day comes, I firmly believe it will hold on like it always does.
Because whenever a crisis comes, there will always be heroes who stand out, reforge it and reinforce it with their very blood and bones.
For one time, and all the times to come.
The Crownless is resurrecting. It is the power you retrieved that makes it possible for us to defend the home.
For this time, you are also a hero that forges Tiancheng.
Not only me, but those people who are sleeping under this land, and who will never meet you.
If they should have a chance to meet you, they would definitely smile and say, thank you for helping us, just like those heroes before.
Therefore, I will never be disappointed by you, no one will.
Is the meaming of me... to become a hero?
Rover, you know, only you yourself can answer this question.
I can't imagine the catastrophe you have gone through... but notwithstanding, you still made it here.
So I think, no matter what is between us, be it distant times or something else, no matter what path you will take in the future and where you will go -
This stop is of great significance.
Rover, your fellow warriors must be excited to see the spark of the old civilization being born in a new world...
Will it burn even more blazing?
The Rover that absorbed Threnodian powers. Yes.
Commander Jiyan entrusted me to develop a new device for you within 72 hours. Very generous of him, I might say.
Conducting research is akin to that of composing music. A perfect movement requires polishing of utmost precision.
Three days! Your hard work is much appreciated!
This is a Converter. Made in a bit of a haste, thus its capacity and conversion efficiency are relatively limited, but it'll suffice for now.
The look in your eyes. Are you skeptical of the Academy's technological expertise?
Worry not, I can vouch for its reliability. I developed it myself, after all.
Or rather, you wish to tarry until you've reached your limit as new inconveniences arise for those around you?
You reached for the device, feeling the powers flow through your palms as it transfers. Your conditions muchly recovered in the process. Right as you were finished, Jiyan made contact.
Everything seems to be taken care of.
It all owes to the Rover's faith in Huanglong's technology.
Come see me at the Regiment building, Lady Loong has agreed to meet you.
Hierarch Loong? Well, the Commander never ceases to disappoint at making arrangements so swiftly.
Mortefi, I believe the Converter requires your tending to.
Sure, sure. I take your meaning.
You'd better be on your way, the Commander isn't keen on being kept waiting.
Yangyang, come with me to the laboratory. I wish to learn more about the TDs you've previously fought.
You remember the way to the Regiment building, right? I'll come find you when everything's done here.
Uhh... I just wanted to get a feel if Rover's scent is the same as the one I'm after, that's all.
I saw someone acting suspicious southeast from here! And poof! Disappeared just like that!
Have Mornguards increase alert levels across the city at once.
I'm one step ahead of ya!
Then, as Commander, you should join us.
Accompany our guest to an audience with Hierarch Loong.
Wonderful. Come on, Rover, let's get going.
Stand down, they are our guests.
Lady Loong, are you injured? And the intruder?
Take it easy now, little Snowflake. This is Rover, who's been with us the whole time. Lady Loong's guest.
That's right! Rover scent is A-ok!
A puzzling individual, Rover form bears that of... Hmph.
Well, yes. I believe I do sense an inexplicably familiar aura from our guest?
Pleased to make your acquaintance, Rover from unknown. I am Jin'xi, Hierarch Loong of Huanglong.
On behalf of Huanglong, allow me to express my sincerest gratitude.
It is my honor, Lady Loong.
Ahem. I regret the slight intrusion we encountered on our first meeting.
I hope that you can pardon our lack hospitality
Rover may not be feeling the best due to exposure of Threnodian powers. I propose we take our leave for today...
All things considered, it seems inconvenient at the moment.
I do wish to speak with you formally at another time. Until then, may I ask another favor of you?
Rest assured, these eyes are sure to find matters we don't notice.
Miserable fools, I welcome you to the dimension fabricated by luminescence!
It seems you know so little of your past.
A pity that you are merely an accidental bonus of my trip.
Until we meet again, my prey.
Won't let you get away with this!
Danjin you're hurt, how bad are your wounds?
I'm fine, these wounds are nothing to worry about, I just need to take my medicine...
Thank you, you must be... The Rover? Danjin finally met the legendary Rover, there's so much I want to say to you! But, I have to go investigate the voices in the mines now...
Voices... Are you here to investigate the Hazy Depths too? Are you the "Ranger who came earlier"?
Yes... Yes! Danjin heard its voices, it's telling me to go see it.
The "Voices" must be the cause of this.
Can you guys hear it? The voices are getting louder...
You're really not in a good state... I can't bear to have you continue an investigation like this.
Yangyang... I really wanna go. I want to find out who these voices belong to, and why it keeps calling out to Danjin...
Then allow me to request permission from the Commander, us Rangers have our rules, remember?
Yangyang? Have you and the Rover reached the Hukou mines?
Yes, sir. We've also met Danjin along the way, her condition is unstable, it is likely that she's under strong influence of the mine's abnormalities, and may be fit for further investigations.
Danjin, how is your physical condition?
A, a little bit below normal... I, I just wanted to help out the Rangers, and I keep hearing these calls...
Return to the city for some treatments for now, the investigation of Hazy Depths is not of your responsibility at the moment.
I... I didn't mean to disobey orders, Danjin's always been a good girl...
You should take good care of yourself.
Danjin returned to Tiancheng under Jiyan's order.
I believe you have already heard of some rumors about the Hazy Depths.
Not long ago, we detected reactions of Crownless powers within the Depths, followed by a series of abnormalities in the Hukou mines.
The fog that's spreading beneath the mines is not only damaging exploration and mining equipments, but also effecting the physical and mental health of the staffs working in the mine.
The voices Danjin and the others are hearing, is it because of the fog?

There is no conclusive evidence to prove this yet, but many share the speculations. It is natural for people to be afraid of the unknown. It's just that these discussions have already affected normal operations of the mine.
With the Crownless's resurrection imminent, the supply of Tacetite must be maintained at all costs.
This issue must be resolved as soon as possbile.
An on-site investigation of the mining sites is needed, it'll provide you with more findings. If you manage to collect some samples of the fog, I can help you reach the Academy for an analysis.
Just a little further... Danjin can finally see who's been calling out to me all this time...
I've heard of the stories before, about the "the voices within the fog are those from your loved ones".
Danjin's always been thinking, those voices, could they be my family calling out to Danjin...
I can make it, we should keep moving.
If it's my family... Danjin, must...
Right here, calling out to me...
You've grown so much, how nice...
Does this place seem like a battlefield from the past to you?
In fact, it used to be an important grain producing area of the Huanglong, with a large expanse of grain fields and food processing plants.
"Granary of the World", was the name they gave it before the Lament.

The Lament, the age of chaos, the Threnodian War... Years of war turned this place into a wasteland where no more grains could be grown, leaving only craters, ruins, and the Incineranur that burn endlessly.
How did the Incineranur came to be?

It was left by Threnodian war more than fifty years ago. In order to buy time for those in the rear, the soldiers of the former 1st Army Division in charge of frontline defenses, used their lives to hold back the Inferno Rider and the army of TDs.
In the end, the Rider was eliminated using the Fission Cannon. There, the tower-like structure.

Later Incinero Petals began to appear where the Inferno Rider was defeated. They grew layer after layer around the Tacet Field, everyone says it's as though a recreation of the 1st Division's battle positions.
The orchids are actually Remnants, not only high in temperature that can burn a person's respiratory tract, it also contains Wutherium Radiation which can lead to psychosis.
Thus, the Protection Device contains two modules, heat absorption and sound insulation. They need be brought together in order to minimize harm caused by Incinero Petals, do keep that in mind.
So the device was invented for the Inferno Rider?
The Inferno Rider's signals were only picked up just recently, but development for the Protection Device started much earlier.
It's thanks to the Academy that we're able to walk on this land once more, especially Director Lu'shen.
He's the one that invented the Protection Device, and also the first to set foot into the Incineranur. He brought back the badges of those fallen, something for their loved ones to cherish.
Yes, the former Army is the predecessor of the Midnight Rangers and Mornguard. I am very proud to have inherited their will.
There's so much TDs, no wonder we couldn't make contact with the campsite from the outpost.
I came to assist after getting a distress call. Noticed that Sound thingamabob went poof, ya know, that thing we use to drive away TDs.
It's called a Sound Dampener. The Ministry does routine inspections on them, they won't break down for no reason, unless it’s like last time...
Is anyone at the campsite injured?
Everyone's in one piece, I've gotten rid of all of em! As for that Sound Dampener, the Ministry's already having engineers come gettin' it fixed.
What about the Protection Devices? Are they still intact?
The buildings have security systems in them, even if some TDs managed to slip through they'll be locked up inside.
Is our little skylark going for the devices?
Rover and I are tasked with eliminating the Inferno Rider in the Incineranur.
So you're the naughty ones that took my prey!
We've not taken anything, it was Commander Jiyan's orders.
"Only the Rover can absorb Threnodian powers." Fine, he did mention something like that I guess.
But, But, you don't look like you can catch up to that two-wheeler to me!
Aww, man. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to fight back, and I wanna beat up that ugly Rider face so bad for 1st Division!
If It wasn't for that distress call, I would've been still helping crack that big old barrier open over at Incineranur!
Luckily we have old reliable Captain Awu!
That's for sure! Oh, you Rangers ain't half bad either!
So, can you lead us to the devices?
I guess so, but the TDs messed up the place pretty badly, I've already notified everyone that the campsite is now under lockdown, and we'll be doing an inspection of the place.
Better watch out you TDs, I'm ain't gonna go easy on ya!
We can help out with the inspection.
Hmm, You... I guess you should be fine with the normal ones. Great! Permission granted!
I'm heading straight to other areas, I'll leave the building to the two of ya.
Through that door over there, Little Skylark.
Captain Awu is a rather straightforward person, he didn't mean anything by it.
Being forthright is a good attribute.
Phew, that's gotta rang a few bells for that two-wheeler!
Go, Go, Go! Let's rock and roll!
Captain Awu, Rover, for a TD in the levels of the Inferno Rider, don't let your guards down.
There's nothing to be afraid of! I'm right here!
The Inferno Rider appeared during the Threnodian War and was classified with the highest danger levels due to two of its major abilities.
It is proficient in harnessing flames. I once heard some called it as an "Endless dashing incendiary bomb".
So why is it afraid of Incinero Petals?
You can interpret Passion Orchid as a Remnant Organism infused with rage, the Inferno Rider isn't afraid of Incinero Petals, but rather the 1st Division.
Another ability is that it is very good at imitating humans operating machinery, especially those who drive various types of armored vehicles.
I remember in the records that the 1st Division was....
Captain! Campsite at Sector 2 is under attack!
Those thieves brought help, and grabbed the devices and are heading towards the Incineranur!
Captain, we've failed you, we couldn't stop them...
They're coming my way? Good, I'll throw em right into the flower bed then!
Could it be... Too much of a coincidence?
Sneaking up on the outpost, sabotaging Sound Dampeners, and raiding campsites. These unknown group of people have been tailing us and causing trouble along the way.
They must've had their eyes on our cannon for a while!
But are they really after the Fission Cannon?
Wait a second, that's not it. If they really wanted to stop us from using the cannon, they would've gone for it earlier or come for us directly, not attack the campsites.
Oh, who cares what they're up to! Let's just beat 'em up!
Good thing everyone's only slightly injured, we're pursuing those bastards as we speak.
There's also Rangers on patrol nearby, I'll contact them right away.
Good, we'll hit them all at once! They're not gettin' away this time!
Captain, The Rangers and us will take care of those scoundrels, just like the 1st Division, we're solid as rocks, sir. You and the Rover can just focus on the Rider.
Like the 1st Division... Solid as rocks...
Regardless of how others think, I believe Rover has already been treating everyone as close companions.
Our new friend, I'll be leaving that two-wheeler to you, got it? So don't you dare lose to it!
End! Of the line! For you!
I think it's best that we leave him to himself for now.
Captain Awu has always been talking about how he would eliminate the Inferno Rider on his own.
Could it be that he feels it was taken out too easily, to a point that is a bit hard for him to comprehend?
No one knows for certain, the Captain never mentioned it to anyone.
The only thing I can think of is that he really looks up to the 1st Division's commander, General Shihui.
It was General Shihui who eliminated the Inferno Rider during the Threnodian War.
So you mean it was a long time ago?
Yes, because the Rider was eliminated a long ago, everyone thought it was strange Captain Awu wouldn't stop taking it all the time.
So, at the time, people thought the Captain just wanted to play hero and make a challenge with his role model. Umm, kind of like a personal dream.
No one anticipated that the Rider would resurrect, and now the Captain's eliminated it as well.
Now that I think of it, it really is a series of interesting events. Perhaps, the Captain may indeed have some kind of destiny and connection with this land?
Yes, the Forsaken Abundance has a special place in his heart.
I heard that he seemed to have been living in the southern mountains before coming to Tiancheng, until he met Commander Xuguan at the Forsaken Abundance. Oh, he's the former Commander of the Rangers.
Therefore, coming here is a fresh beginning for him.
Oh, there's more. Commander Xuguan and past Rangers would say that they see the General in Captain Awu.
"The courage to fight till the end without fear of sacrifice". Is what I think they referred to.
He is truly brave, and little straightforward.
At the beginning, everyone was worried if he had what it takes to be a Captain.
Yet, his growth is evident to all, I think Commander Xuguan made the right choice.
Besides, bravery and simplicity are wonderful qualities of a person no matter when!
Let's head back to Tianchen, we have much to report.
